title: Anders_Bitcoin
author: Anders_Bitcoin
content: The team of the decentralized exchange Wowswap announced the launch of its own aggregator Wowmax in early July.They intend to compete with the existing 1inch, Matcha and Uniswap further reducing the price impact when sending orders and using asset arbitrage strategy to extract a positive slippage, 100% of which is paid to the trader in native $WUT tokens, which are also deflationary.Wowmax have launch immediately after the $WUT token presale and $WUT listing on Uniswap and other exchanges ends in early July.
